mapper.select: select t.tno, t.tname, t.tepath, date_format(t.treg_date, '%y.%m.%d') as tregDate, t.tmem_cnt as tmemCnt, t.tcontent, t.tpoint, t.tlatitude, t.tlongitude, m.mname as tleader, m.memail as tleaderEmail from team as t left join member as m on m.tno = t.tno where m.mleader_yn = 'Y' and t.tno = #{tno}

select count(*) from team where tpoint like #{district}
and tname like #{keyword}
SELECT TNO ,TNAME ,TEPATH ,TREG_DATE ,TMEM_CNT ,TCONTENT ,TPOINT ,TLATITUDE ,TLONGITUDE FROM TEAM WHERE TNO = #{tno}
SELECT MNO ,MNAME ,MPATH ,MEMAIL ,MPNO ,MGENDER FROM MEMBER WHERE MPNO = #{mpno} AND MLEADER_YN = 'N' AND MENTER_YN = 'N' AND MAPPLY_YN = 'N'
